ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspsnel5a.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspsnel5a.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lspsnel5a.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 4 |  | lspsnel5a.a | |- ( ph -> U e. S ) |
| 5 |  | lspsnel5a.x | |- ( ph -> X e. U ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 7 | 6, 1 | #P_lssel | |- ( ( U e. S /\ X e. U ) -> X e. ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 1, 2, 3, 4, 8 | #P_lspsnel5 | |- ( ph -> ( X e. U <-> ( N ` { X } ) C_ U ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) C_ U ) |
